summary: Build a mindful screen tracking app called Mindful Screen that monitors usage time, suggests healthy activities when limits are exceeded, includes calming background music, simple mini-games, and a notes feature for daily thoughts/activities.

existing_features.title: Create the Mindful Screen app shell with navigation for: Dashboard (timer + suggestions), Games, Notes, and Settings.
Implement a mindful screen-time tracker for in-app usage time (time spent actively using the Mindful Screen web app) with a user-configurable daily time limit and session tracking.
When the configured time limit is exceeded, show mindful break suggestions (e.g., “Talk with a friend”, “Read a book”) and provide a way to cycle to a new suggestion.
Add a Games section that includes at minimum: Tic Tac Toe, a simple puzzle game, a riddles mode, and a math problems mode.
Add peaceful, pleasant background music and optional soft sound effects with user controls (play/pause, volume, and mute) and persistence of audio preferences.
Implement a Notes feature where the user can create, view, edit, and delete notes to store thoughts or day-to-day activities; notes must persist per user.
Add Internet Identity sign-in and require authentication for saving/retrieving user data (time-limit settings and notes).
Apply a coherent, calming visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and components) optimized for low distraction.
Add generated static visual assets for branding and ambiance and render them in the UI (stored in frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Track screen/app usage time and detect when user-defined time limits are exceeded
When limits are exceeded, show mindful break suggestions (e.g., talk to a friend, read a book)
Include mini-games: tic tac toe, puzzles, riddles, math problems, etc.
Provide peaceful, pleasant background music and sounds to support mindful breaks
Add a notes option for storing thoughts and day-to-day activities
